info.title: Egnyte
info.description: Egnyte is a service that keeps your files safe, synced, and easy to share. Connect to Egnyte to manage your files. You can perform various actions such as upload, update, get, and delete files in Egnyte.

get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder.

id.description: The ID of an event.
id.title: Event ID

timestamp.description: The ISO-8601 formatted timestamp for when this event was recorded.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

actor.description: The numeric ID of the user who performed the action.
actor.title: User ID

action.description: The action associated with this event.
action.title: Action

target_id.description: The ID of the specific version of the file.
target_id.title: Version ID

target_group_id.description: The ID to reference the file as a whole.
target_group_id.title: File ID

is_folder.description: Whether the resource is a folder (True or False).
is_folder.title: Is Folder

action_source.description: The source of the event. For example WebUI, Mobile, etc.
action_source.title: Action Source

parameters.name: FolderPath
parameters.description: The path to the target folder.
